description: Alan Turing proposes a test for machine intelligence. If a machine can converse with a human without being detected as a machine, it has demonstrated intelligence.
The term 'artificial intelligence' is coined by John McCarthy at a workshop at Dartmouth College, considered the birth of AI as a field.
IBM's Deep Blue chess computer defeats world champion Garry Kasparov in a six-game match.
IBM's Watson question-answering system wins the quiz show Jeopardy!, defeating two former champions.
